name: Atomic Heart: Annihilation Instinct
description:
Atomic Heart: Annihilation Instinct is an action, shooter, adventure and RPG game developed by Mundfish. It came out on 02-08-2023. Focus Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Atomic Heart: Annihilation Instinct is available on Xbox Series S/X, PlayStation 4, PC and PlayStation 5. The game is sold via PlayStation Store and Steam.
